hugo installlation brew install hugo hugo create site hugo new site leijingwei # a folder leijingwei will be created with a config.toml file hugo new site leijingwei -f yml # a folder leijingwei will be created with a config.yml file add a theme to your site Go to the https://themes.gohugo.io/ , find your favourite theme.
hugo create post You will use this command to create a new post.
hugo new posts/new-post.md And you will use the following contents to edit your post.
title: "A New Start" draft: true author: "Jingwei Lei" date: 2022-10-07T01:45:59+08:00 description: "This is description" tags: ["markdown", "css", "html", "themes"] categories: ["themes", "syntax"] series: ["Themes Guide"] aliases: ["migrate-from-jekyl"] ShowToc: true TocOpen: true hugo generate static files hugo -D other hugo commands hugo server -D
